meanings.sent1: The shiny coins were very collectable.
meanings.sent2: Stamps are a popular collectable hobby.
meanings.sent3: The collectable toys seemed to have a secret meeting in the toy chest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a collectable melody that echoed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The collectable seashells glistened in the sunlight, inviting beachcombers to pick them up.

meanings.definition: An item that is sought after by collectors.
meanings.sent1: The rare comic book was a valuable collectable.
meanings.sent2: Antique furniture can be a valuable collectable for some people.
meanings.sent3: The collectable figurines on the shelf seemed to be having a party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a collectable that brightened up everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The vintage car was a collectable that many enthusiasts dreamed of owning.
